member.name: T:MassTransit.Subscriptions.SubscriptionBusService
member.summary:
Manages the subscription and un subscription of message consumers to the service bus as part of the bus lifecycle.
As a bus service, once the bus is started and operational, this service will get started. At this point, any registered consumers and sagas will be subscribed to the bus.
When stop is called, those subscriptions will be removed unless the registration information indicated that the subscription is meant to be persistent, and not removed on service shutdown.
